# Farmers Bank Microservices Solution

## Project Overview
This is a .NET 8 microservices solution for Farmers Bank's Government backed loan program implementing domain-driven design with four core domains:
- Member Services
- Loans & Underwriting  
- Payments
- Fraud/Risk

## Architecture
- REST API and gRPC endpoints for each microservice
- Azure Kubernetes Service deployment
- Azure SQL Managed Instance integration
- Azure API Management gateway
- Infrastructure as Code using Bicep
- PCI DSS, SOX compliance and data protection
- Azure Monitor and Application Insights
